db:abstract.db:para: The QtPositioning global object provides useful functions for working with location-based types in QML.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
geocircle circle()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an invalid geocircle.

db:section.db:title: geocircle circle(coordinate center, real radius)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a geocircle centered at center with a radius of radius meters.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.12] point coordToMercator(coordinate coord)
db:section.db:para: Converts a coordinate into a mercator coordinate.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:section.db:title: coordinate coordinate()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an invalid coordinate.

db:section.db:title: coordinate coordinate(real latitude, real longitue, real altitude)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a coordinate with the specified latitude, longitude and optional altitude. Both latitude and longitude must be valid, otherwise an invalid coordinate is returned.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.12] coordinate mercatorToCoord(point mercator)
db:section.db:para: Converts a mercator coordinate into a latitude-longitude coordinate.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.9] geopath path()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty geopath.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.9.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.10] geopolygon polygon()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty polygon.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.10.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.10] geopolygon polygon(list<coordinate> coordinates)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a polygon from coordinates.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.10.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.12] geopolygon polygon(list<coordinate> perimeter, list<list<coordinate>> holes)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a polygon from coordinates for perimeter and inner holes.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.12.

db:section.db:title: georectangle rectangle()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an invalid georectangle.

db:section.db:title: georectangle rectangle(coordinate center, real width, real height)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a georectangle centered at center with a width of width degrees and a hight of height degrees.

db:section.db:title: georectangle rectangle(coordinate topLeft, coordinate bottomRight)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a georectangle with its top left corner positioned at topLeft and its bottom right corner positioned at bottomLeft.

db:section.db:title: geoshape shape()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an invalid geoshape.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.5] geocircle shapeToCircle(geoshape shape)
db:section.db:para: Converts shape to a geocircle.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.9] geopath shapeToPath(geoshape shape)
db:section.db:para: Converts shape to a geopath.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.9.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.10] geopolygon shapeToPolygon(geoshape shape)
db:section.db:para: Converts shape to a polygon.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.10.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.5] georectangle shapeToRectangle(geoshape shape)
db:section.db:para: Converts shape to a georectangle.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.5.
